# DataVis_Final
This repo contains the visulization and analyze on Share rides data in Austin Area in Tableau.

# Data
Here is the data I use: [Data from open source](https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/rideaustin/table/?%3D%3D)

# Main Analysis
- The relationship between weather and travel distance
- The relationship between car make and travel distance & ratings
- The relationship between Trip and Geographic & Time

# Main Plots Type:
- Hisogram
- Bar Plot
- Scatter Plot
- Bubble Plot
- Tree Mapping
- Box Plot
- Chloropleth Map
- Connection Map
- Heat Map
- Stacked Area Graph

# Summary/ Main Results:
-	Weather has some inverse influence on the share rides. In bad weathers, there are more needs of share rides.
-	The main car makes in share ride market in the Austin area are Toyota, Honda and Nissan. Majority of the car models are Economic types. Car makes and Models has influence on Driver ratings.
-	The Trips districted imbalanced in geographic and times. The downtown area has more ride needs. There are also more ride needs in holiday seasons.

#### Please See the Final reports and twb for more details. [Link](https://github.com/ziyufan/dataVis_Final/blob/master/Final_Project.pdf)
